message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is truly exceptional. Given its unique features and high quality, I'm confident it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering this product to you for $15000. Please let me know if this price works for you, or if you have any other offers in mind.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm currently looking to stay within a budget of $10000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10000?
